Sprinkler System Installation Fit Off ITP
Fit Off - Part 1
Check Sprinkler Heads for damage/scratches to paint finish
Check Flexi for damage/kinks (take a photo of any damaged Flexi with room/area reference)
Check the water is drained the water out of the system
Installation drawings are the most recent revision and are ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION?
Laser used to fit off to accurate measurements?
Sprinklers installed as per AS2118 with no obstructions?
Have the correct sprinklers been installed? (Temperature rating, Fast Response, Finish)
Check the water is reinstated into the system at the completion of fit off
Fit Off - Part 2
Check sprinkler heads for damage/scratches to paint finish
Check sprinkler heads are straight and parallel to finished surface
Check there is no paint or gyprock setting on sprinkler head
Outer escutcheon plates installed
Check there is no gaps between the outer escutcheon plate and the finished ceiling
Sprinklers installed as per AS2118 with no obstructions?
Hydrostatic Pressure Test
1.6MPa or 400 kpa in excess of the maximum static working pressure (whichever is greater) for a period of 2 hours, with no loss of pressure duration the 2 hour duration.
Are the pipework Joints, connections, position & spacing correct?
Are all open ends plugged off to close up the piping network?

Dry Fire Cable Rough In
Installation drawings are the most recent revision and are ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION?
Room/area layout set out and confirmed with the assistance of building team?
Cable installed to device locations as per the most recent ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION drawings?
Cable supports installed correctly?
Sufficient slack in cable to reach required fit off location?
Cable tray installed as per AS 3000?
Fire Detection cable has compliant spacing between Detection, EWIS/OWS and electrical power cable?
Fire Rating/acoustic sealing of penetrations completed prior to ceiling sheeting?
Are wires clearly drawn and submitted for AS BUILTS/AS CONSTRUCTED drawings
Are all devices numbered on drawing for AS BUILTS/AS CONSTRUCTED drawings?
Riser Cable Tray Installation & cables installed in a neat order?
Cable supported to tray
Fire Rating/acoustic sealing of penetrations completed prior to ceiling sheeting?
Smoke Detection & EWIS/OWS Fit Off
Installation drawings are the most recent revision and are ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION?
Excess slack in cable removed?
Smoke and Thermal Detectors are installed in correct dimensioned locations as per the ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION drawings?
Check Thermal and Smoke Detectors installed in accordance with AS1670, AS1668, BCA (take photo of data sheet for devices being installed)
EWIS/OWS speaker are installed in the correct dimensioned locations as per the ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION drawings?
Laser used to fit off to accurate measurements?
WIP/MCP installed as per AS1670 & BCA
All devices are numbered correctly using labels (NO MARKERS) and in correct location as per the AS BUILT DEVICE numbering markup?
All devices are fit off as per ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION drawings and clear of any obstructions?
Cable joints and terminations correctly completed with no tension on the terminals?
All traffolyte labels are installed to each WIP/MCP and field module?
Sprinkler System Commissioning
Check operation of the monitored isolation valve and record FIP interface
Inspect and test gauge operation (record a video of the drop in pressure and the pressure re-stabilising to static working pressure)
Check operation of manual test drain confirm flow switch activation to FIP
Check operation of the water pressure switch activation to FIP
Check operation of solenoid test drain confirm FSW activation to FIP
Check the operation of the water motor alarm
Fire Detection System Commissioning
Test each Smoke Detector in accordance with AS1670, AS1668, BCA using smoke can and record FIP alarm.
Test each thermal Detector in accordance with AS1670, AS1668, BCA using a heat detector tester kit can and record FIP alarm.
Test Speakers in accordance with AS1670 & BCA under general fire alarm and record results using a sound probe meter
Test Visual Alarm Devices in accordance with AS1670 & BCA under general fire alarm
Test WIP phones in accordance AS1670, BCA
Test Manual Call Points in accordance with AS1670, BCA and record FIP/EWIS alarm
Test Field Module Interfaces in accordance with AS1670, AS1668, BCA and record FIP alarm (take a photo of the Interface and FIP the the same time)
Test the activation of smoke/fire door magnetic hold open devices under local fire alarm
test the activation of mechanical fire trips under general fire alarm
Test the activation of security fire trips under general fire alarm
Test the EWIS/OWS time delay for cascading and changing from ALERT to EVAC (record a video of the EWIS/OWS Panel)
Test the activation of network monitoring during latching FIP alarm
Test the activation of the external bell under fire trip mode in accordance AS1670, BCA
Test the activation of the external strobe under fire trip mode in accordance AS1670, BCA
